required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Correction of Lower Limb Deformities With Fixator Assisted Nailing
clinical_study.official_title: Correction of Lower Limb Deformities With Fixator Assisted Nailing

brief_summary.textblock: It is a retrospective study at a tertiary care hospital. All cases of lower limb deformity whose correction was done with fixator assisted IM nailing from 2010 till 2017 were analyzed.

detailed_description.textblock: It is a retrospective study at a tertiary care hospital. All cases of lower limb deformity whose correction was done with fixator assisted IM nailing from 2010 till 2017 were analyzed. Pre Op x-rays and post op x rays will be analyzed for Mechanical Axis Deviation (MAD), anatomical Lateral Distal Femoral Angle (aLDFA), mechanical Lateral Distal Femoral Angle (mLDFA) and Medial Proximal Tibial Angle (MPTA), post-operative activity and functional status of the patients. Data will be analyzed using SPSS

primary_outcome.description: Correction of lower limb deformities with fixator assisted nailing

study_pop.textblock: .All those patients who has lower limb deformity irrespective of the cause underwent fixator assisted intramedullary nailing of tibia or femurs for deformity correction were included

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All those patients who underwent fixator assisted intramedullary nailing of tibia or femurs for deformity correction were included
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients who lost to follow up and those with missing records were excluded from the study.
